articles.title: Meet 1 Top AI Stock That Has Soared 675% Since 2022

articles.summary: Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META) has soared 675% since early November 2022. The company is investing heavily in artificial intelligence (AI) technology. It has already launched AI features for its social media users, helping them find information, edit photos, and write more creatively. It's also making a hardware push with Ray-Ban smart glasses.

articles.title: Four Ways To Use Prosocial AI As Catalyst Of Economic Prosperity
articles.author: Cornelia C. Walther
articles.summary: 1.2 billion people live in poverty, 600 million people live on less than $2.15 per day, 2.9 billion people are disconnected from the digital revolution. AI's benefits currently flow mainly to the privileged few, but its true power lies in its targeted application to specific, entrenched problems. It can either exacerbate or help resolve these historical burdens.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman admits that AI's benefits may not be widely distributed
articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.summary: In a blog post, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman proposes a 'compute budget' to spread the benefits of AI technology more widely. Altman claims that artificial general intelligence (AGI) is near, but it will require a lot of human supervision and direction to be perfect. The company is reportedly in talks to raise up to $40 billion in a funding round and wants to reach $100 billion in revenue by 2029, equal to Target and Nestle's annual sales.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman admits that AI's benefits may not be widely distributed
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is open to a 'compute budget' to spread the benefits of AI technology more widely. AI is already impacting the labor market, resulting in job cuts and departmental downsizing. Experts have warned that mass unemployment is a possible outcome of the rise of AI tech if not accompanied by the right government policies and reskilling and upskilling programs.

articles.author: Lakshmi Varanasi
articles.summary: Sam Altman's World Network surveyed over 90,000 users on AI and dating. It found that 26% of people flirt with chatbots, knowingly or not. Replika, a dating app launched in 2017, had about 676,000 daily active users, with the average user spending two hours a day on the app. About 90% of respondents want dating apps to have a system for verifying real humans.

McLean County Unit 5 has created a framework to incorporate AI into the classroom.

articles.author: Karla Rendon
articles.summary: Ryan Honary, 16, has created a wildfire-detecting sensor network that analyzes smoke and heat data to alert firefighters when a brush fire occurs. Honary received an ONR Naval Science Award and won the grand prize at the Ignite Innovation Student Challenge for his work with SensoRy AI. Orange County Fire Authority is working with Honary to turn his platform into a deployable product.

articles.title: Orange County teen creates network of sensors to detect wildfires

CAIOs focus on AI solutions for clinical applications, but AI's potential can also be used to improve business operations. The CAIO must establish a governance framework that ensures ethical, transparent, and responsible AI deployment.

articles.title: Google Photos Just Got Better At Detecting AI-Generated Images.

articles.summary: Google is adding invisible digital watermarks to its powerful Reimagine tool. Google Photos will now show you when an image has been edited with the tool. The watermarks are created using a Google DeepMind technology called SynthID. Google is keeping its image-based watermarking tools under wraps for now.

articles.title: Be One of the First With Alienware's RTX 5080 Gaming PC
articles.author: Alfred Custodio
articles.summary: Alienware Area-51 Gaming Desktop is equipped with a powerful Intel Core Ultra 9 285K processor, featuring 24 cores and a total cache of 76MB. The graphics performance is handled by the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080, which comes with 16GB of GDDR7 memory. The system includes 32 GB of DDR5 RAM, configured as two 16 GB modules, with an XMP speed of 6400 MT/s. Storage is provided by a 2TB NVMe M.2 PCIe Gen4 SSD. The power supply unit is a robust 1500W Platinum Rated ATX12VO PSU.

articles.title: Meta develops 'hat' for typing text by thinking — uses AI to read brain signals for keypresses

articles.summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg has said that the company is working on a system that will allow you to type directly via your brain. According to MIT Technology Review, the tech giant was able to successfully create the technology. It's a massive and expensive machine that needs to be used in isolation to work effectively and costs $2,000,000. The magnetoencephalography scanner reads the magnetic signals that your neurons generate when they fire.
